pages.text:
Main content starts here, tab to start navigating
Our Story
At Clasico Italian Chophouse, we believe great food starts with great intention. We don’t just prepare meals—we create experiences, beginning with the ingredients we choose and the care we put into every dish. Our kitchen is fueled by a commitment to craftsmanship: pasta is rolled by hand daily, dough is tossed fresh to order, and every steak is hand-cut to exacting standards. This dedication to doing things the right way—not the easy way—reflects our belief that food made with heart simply tastes better.
But Clasico is more than just a restaurant—it’s a gathering place for our Sarasota community. Located in the heart of downtown, we’ve built our space to feel warm, vibrant, and full of life, just like the meals we serve. Whether it's your weekly family dinner, a special celebration, or a spontaneous night out with friends, we want every guest to feel welcomed, seen, and at home. We believe in the power of the shared table—where stories are told, laughter is loud, and food becomes a language of connection.
Our menu reflects this spirit, blending the soulful flavors of classic Italian cooking with the bold indulgence of a modern chophouse. It’s a place where the familiar meets the unexpected—from wood-fired pizzas and house-made sauces to thoughtfully plated entrees designed to be passed, shared, and savored. We embrace the Italian philosophy of hospitality: generous portions, honest ingredients, and meals that bring people together.
At the core of everything we do is a love for our community and a passion for hospitality. We support local purveyors, celebrate local culture, and aim to be a place locals are proud to call their own. When you dine at Clasico, you’re not just a guest—you’re family. And we’re here to make sure every moment, every meal, and every memory feels truly special.
Main Street Entertainment Group
Vision. Execution. Legacy.
Main Street Entertainment Group is a hospitality company rooted in innovation, experience, and proven success. Founded and led by Kevin Enderle, a visionary with over 35 years in the restaurant and hospitality industry, with expertise spanning concept development, design, operations, and culinary execution, Main Street Entertainment Group doesn’t just open restaurants—we craft experiences. From neighborhood staples to elevated dining destinations, every venue is built with intention, authenticity, and the belief that great food and great service should always go hand in hand.
Clasico Italian Chophouse has served as our flagship concept for many years. Now, with a growing portfolio that includes Bosc Modern Bar + Kitchen and Parker Street Bakery, we’re expanding into the heart of South Tampa as we continue to shape the future of hospitality in Florida and beyond.

Special Event?
Host your next private event in style at Clasico Italian Chophouse, where elegance meets exceptional cuisine. Whether you're celebrating a milestone birthday, organizing a corporate gathering, or hosting a special family dinner, our dedicated team ensures an unforgettable experience tailored to your needs. Indulge in our sumptuous Italian-inspired dishes expertly crafted with the finest ingredients, paired with an extensive selection of wines and cocktails. Our sophisticated ambiance and impeccable service provide the perfect backdrop for your event, creating memories that will last a lifetime. Contact us today to book your private event and let us elevate your occasion at Clasico Italian Chophouse.
Inquire Now
Let Us Cater Your Next Event
At our restaurant, we believe that every event is an opportunity to create unforgettable memories through extraordinary food and impeccable service. Whether you're planning an intimate gathering or a grand celebration, our team of culinary experts and event professionals is here to make your vision a reality.
Inquire Now
